public_instructions:
Look at the shoes in the pictures. You need to group them using instruction at the right (see screenshot). Shoes of one group must be labeled with the same color.

Note: if you don't see instructions like on screenshot, make sure that you have default 100% zoom on the page (ctrl+0 to set it ).
If some images are cropped, change zoom (ctrl+ of ctrl-).



This is training. Here you'll become familiar with the interface to be able to do more complex tasks.
You will be told what to do in the mini-instructions on the page.
Then you have to pass exam without explicitly specified criteria. After this you will get access to the main tasks which are more complex and good paid.

Read the instructions on the page. Good luck!
